short_summary: Remove tower and foundations at 12km North of Penetanguishene, ON
full_summary:
### [title] Brébeuf Rear Range Tower Removal
#### [reference number] cb-452-8185118

**Tender Announcement**
A Request for Proposal (RFP) is posted to solicit bids from interested parties for the removal of the Brébeuf rear range tower located 12 km north of the town of Penetanguishene, Ontario.

**Project Details**
* Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Procurement Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR), Midland, Canada

**Tender Timeline**
* Publication Date: June 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 15, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: October 25, 2024

**Project Description**
The removal of the tower and foundation, including all appurtenances, is to be conducted from contract award date to October 25, 2024. Security requirements do not apply.

**Pre-Proposal Submissions**
All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least seven (7) calendar days before the tender closing date.

**Attachments**
RFP documents, including the Statement of Work and tender schedule, are available for download on the Canada Buys website.
Attachments include:
* [link to Statement of Work]
* [link to Tender Schedule]
* [link to Addendum 001]
* [link to Addendum 002]
* [link to Addendum 003]

**Response Person**
Lana Hunt
Email: lana.hunt@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
Phone: (604) 355-0314
Please include your [reference number] in the subject line of your email. 

**RFP Notice Details**
* Solicitation Number: 30005669
* Amendment Number: 5
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods. 

Please be sure to take note of the Parameters.
